下拉选项

普通下拉 

		
<div class="dropdown drop2-wrapper" name="aa""></div>
		
	
		
$(".dropdown.drop2-wrapper[name='aa']").drop2({
	id:"meme",
	caret:"<i class='glyphicon glyphicon-menu-down'></i>",
	label:"文字drop测试",
	data:[
		  {label:"用户设置"},
		  {label:"修改密码"},
		  {label:"接触绑定"},
		  {label:"退出"}
		 ]
});

多级选项 

		
<div class="dropdown drop2-wrapper" name="bb""></div>
		
	
					
$(".dropdown.drop2-wrapper[name='bb']").drop2({
	id:"meme",
	caret:"<i class='glyphicon glyphicon-menu-down'></i>",
	label:"多级菜单",
	data:[
		  {label:"标题1",
		   sub:[
			  {label:"中国"},
			   {label:"美国"},
			   {label:"饿国"}
		  ]},
		  {label:"标题2",
		   sub:[
			 {label:"中国1"},
			  {label:"中国2"},
			  {label:"中国3"}
		  ]}
		 ]
}).on("item_click",function(e,data){
	console.log(data);
});

下拉选项--选择/更新 

		
<div class="dropdown drop2-wrapper" name="cc""></div>
		
	
					
$(".dropdown.drop2-wrapper[name='cc']").drop2({
	type:2,
	id:"meme2",
	caret:"",
	label:{label:"用户设置"},
	data:[
		  {label:"用户设置"},
		  {label:"修改密码"},
		  {label:"接触绑定"},
		  {label:"退出"}
		 ]
}).on("item_click",function(e,data){
	console.log(data);
});
